Squizzy::

She looked at FZ. "She said what?!  Steal HER experiments?" She felt 
her face turn red with anger. "She was asking me to help her on the 
plans to make the most perfect, genetically engineered, natural bot 
ever made. And she was going to creat that bot. She said I was going 
to steal her experiments? I was going to assist her in the greatest 
sceintific experiment on this planet. How can she say that. I thought 
we were friends. I thought she trusted me as I trusted her. And then 
she attacked me." She paced the floor a bit. "I can't believe this. 
Tell Zardus that I'll give him the report and all the info I have. 
Then I'll maek these bots for him and show that little featherhead 
not to backstab a mongoose like that." She rubbed the spot where the 
needle had penetrated her side. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ frowns, looking at Squizzy. "She told me you wanted to steal 
credit 
> for her experiments and so she tried to terminate her."
> 
> He looks at the remains of the two bots, the Iron Fist's computer 
and 
> Zardus' own memory working in his head, "She doesn't sound like 
she's 
> telling the truth though. What did you two work on in the lab?"
> 
>
